r_name = #{rName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_pdc_region set region_name_path = replace(region_name_path,''+ #{rNameDb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} + '/','' + #{rName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} + '/') where region_name_path like '' + #{rNameDb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} + '/%'
